data.eml:eml: Two new species of endemic Ecuadorean Amaryllidaceae (Asparagales, Amaryllidaceae, Amarylloideae, Eucharideae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meerow, Alan W., Jost, Lou, Oleas, Nora (2015): Two new species of endemic Ecuadorean Amaryllidaceae (Asparagales, Amaryllidaceae, Amarylloideae, Eucharideae). PhytoKeys 48: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.48.4399, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.48.4399
